languages.text: Свобода познавать свои новые силы была дарована Номос ненадолго — по велению Темных богов {name} фон Валанциус заточил{mf||а} их в Ярмо, сделав своим цепным чудовищем. Странная сущность, облеченная силой частицы звездного божества, были неподвластны влиянию повелителей варпа, а значит — опасны для них и обречены на рабство.

Nomos did not have long to learn their new powers. At the bidding of the Dark Gods, {name} von Valancius imprisoned them within the Yoke, turning them into {mf|his|her} shackled monster. The strange entity, imbued with a sliver of a Star God's power, was beyond the reach of the rulers of the warp. And, as such, they were dangerous and destined to be enslaved.
languages.original_text: Свобода познавать свои новые силы была дарована Номос ненадолго — по велению Темных богов {name} фон Валанциус заточил{mf||а} их в Ярмо, сделав своим цепным чудовищем. Странная сущность, облеченная силой частицы звездного божества, были неподвластны влиянию повелителей варпа, а значит — опасны для них и обречены на рабство.

traits.locale_text: The freedom to learn their new powers was not given to Nomos for long. Following the demand of the Dark Gods, {name} von Valancius imprisoned them with the Yoke and made him {mf|his|her} chained monster. A strange entity, imbued with the power of a sliver of a Star God, was beyond the reach of the rulers of warp. And as such, they were dangerous and destined to be enslaved.

A strange entity, imbued with the power of a sliver of a Star God, was beyond the reach of the rulers of warp. And as such, they were dangerous and destined to be enslaved.

The strange entity, imbued with a sliver of a Star God's power, was beyond the reach of the rulers of the warp. And, as such, they were dangerous and destined to be enslaved.

The strange entity, imbued with a sliver of a Star God's power, was beyond the reach of the rulers of the warp. And, as such, they were dangerous and destined to be enslaved.

The strange entity, imbued with a sliver of a Star God's power, was beyond the reach of the rulers of the warp. And, as such, they were dangerous and destined to be enslaved.

Nomos did not have long to learn their new powers. At the bidding of the Dark Gods, {name} von Valancius imprisoned them within the Yoke, turning them into {mf|his|her} shackled monster. The strange entity, imbued with a sliver of a Star God's power, was beyond the reach of the rulers of the warp. And, as such, they were dangerous and destined to be enslaved.

languages.text: 诺莫斯没过多久就学会了使用它们的新力量。在黑暗诸神的命令下，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯用圣枷囚禁了诺莫斯，将它们变成了供自己驱使的怪物。这只蕴含着星神之力的古怪实体已经超出了亚空间统治者的控制范围，它们过于危险，必须被奴役。
languages.original_text: Nomos did not have long to learn their new powers. At the bidding of the Dark Gods, {name} von Valancius imprisoned them within the Yoke, turning them into {mf|his|her} shackled monster. The strange entity, imbued with a sliver of a Star God's power, was beyond the reach of the rulers of the warp. And, as such, they were dangerous and destined to be enslaved.

traits.locale_text: 诺莫斯没过多久就学会了使用它们的新力量。在黑暗诸神的命令下，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯用圣枷囚禁了诺莫斯，将它们变成了供自己驱使的怪物。这只蕴含着星神之力的古怪实体已经超出了亚空间统治者的控制范围，它们过于危险，必须被奴役。

languages.text: Nomos hatten nicht lange Zeit, um den Umgang mit ihren neuen Kräften zu erlernen. Auf Geheiß der Dunklen Götter sperrte {name} von Valancius sie in das Joch und verwandelte sie in {mf|sein|ihr} gefesseltes Monster. Das merkwürdige Wesen, in dem ein Fragment der Macht eines Sternengottes steckte, war von den Herrschern des Warp nicht zu erreichen. Nomos waren daher gefährlich und dazu bestimmt, versklavt zu werden.
languages.original_text: Nomos did not have long to learn their new powers. At the bidding of the Dark Gods, {name} von Valancius imprisoned them within the Yoke, turning them into {mf|his|her} shackled monster. The strange entity, imbued with a sliver of a Star God's power, was beyond the reach of the rulers of the warp. And, as such, they were dangerous and destined to be enslaved.

traits.locale_text: Nomos hatten nicht lange Zeit, um den Umgang mit ihren neuen Kräften zu erlernen. Auf Geheiß der Dunklen Götter sperrte {name} von Valancius sie in das Joch und verwandelte sie in {mf|sein|ihr} gefesseltes Monster. Das merkwürdige Wesen, in dem ein Fragment der Macht eines Sternengottes steckte, war von den Herrschern des Warp nicht zu erreichen. Nomos waren daher gefährlich und dazu bestimmt, versklavt zu werden.

languages.text: Nomos n'eut guère le temps de profiter de ses nouveaux pouvoirs. Écoutant les Dieux Sombres, {name} von Valancius l'emprisonna avec le Joug pour le transformer en un monstre à ses ordres. Cette étrange entité, dotée d'un fragment de pouvoir d'un Dieu Stellaire, était hors de la portée des souverains du Warp. Un être aussi dangereux était donc destiné à être asservi.
languages.original_text: Nomos did not have long to learn their new powers. At the bidding of the Dark Gods, {name} von Valancius imprisoned them within the Yoke, turning them into {mf|his|her} shackled monster. The strange entity, imbued with a sliver of a Star God's power, was beyond the reach of the rulers of the warp. And, as such, they were dangerous and destined to be enslaved.

traits.locale_text: Nomos n'eut guère le temps de profiter de ses nouveaux pouvoirs. Écoutant les Dieux Sombres, {name} von Valancius l'emprisonna avec le Joug pour le transformer en un monstre à ses ordres. Cette étrange entité, dotée d'un fragment de pouvoir d'un Dieu Stellaire, était hors de la portée des souverains du Warp. Un être aussi dangereux était donc destiné à être asservi.

languages.text: Nomos no tuvo mucho tiempo para aprender a controlar sus nuevos poderes. Bajo las órdenes de los Dioses Oscuros, {name} von Valancius lo apresó con el Yugo, convirtiéndolo en un monstruo encadenado. La extraña entidad, que poseía un ápice del poder de un dios estelar, era intocable para los amos de la disformidad. Por lo tanto, era peligrosa y debía permanecer esclavizada.
languages.original_text: Nomos did not have long to learn their new powers. At the bidding of the Dark Gods, {name} von Valancius imprisoned them within the Yoke, turning them into {mf|his|her} shackled monster. The strange entity, imbued with a sliver of a Star God's power, was beyond the reach of the rulers of the warp. And, as such, they were dangerous and destined to be enslaved.

traits.locale_text: Nomos no tuvo mucho tiempo para aprender a controlar sus nuevos poderes. Bajo las órdenes de los Dioses Oscuros, {name} von Valancius lo apresó con el Yugo, convirtiéndolo en un monstruo encadenado. La extraña entidad, que poseía un ápice del poder de un dios estelar, era intocable para los amos de la disformidad. Por lo tanto, era peligrosa y debía permanecer esclavizada.

languages.text: ノモスが新たな力を学ぶのに長い時間はかからなかった。暗黒神の命令で、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは彼らをヨークで幽閉し、足かせをはめた怪物に変えた。星々の神の力の一片を宿した奇妙な実体は、歪みの支配者の手の届かない存在だった。そしてそれ故に、彼らは危険であり、奴隷にされる運命にあった。
languages.original_text: Nomos did not have long to learn their new powers. At the bidding of the Dark Gods, {name} von Valancius imprisoned them within the Yoke, turning them into {mf|his|her} shackled monster. The strange entity, imbued with a sliver of a Star God's power, was beyond the reach of the rulers of the warp. And, as such, they were dangerous and destined to be enslaved.

traits.locale_text: ノモスが新たな力を学ぶのに長い時間はかからなかった。暗黒神の命令で、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは彼らをヨークで幽閉し、足かせをはめた怪物に変えた。星々の神の力の一片を宿した奇妙な実体は、歪みの支配者の手の届かない存在だった。そしてそれ故に、彼らは危険であり、奴隷にされる運命にあった。

languages.text: Nomos'un yeni güçlerini tanımaya fazla zamanı olmadı. {name} von Valancius, Kara Tanrıların buyruğuyla onu hapsetti ve kontrolü altındaki, zincirlenmiş bir yaratığa dönüştürdü. Yıldız Tanrı'nın gücünün bir kısmını bünyesinde barındıran tuhaf varlık, öteboyutun hükümdarlarının asla olamayacağı bir şeydi. Bundan ötürü fazlasıyla tehlikeliydi ve köleleştirilmesi gerekiyordu.
languages.original_text: Nomos did not have long to learn their new powers. At the bidding of the Dark Gods, {name} von Valancius imprisoned them within the Yoke, turning them into {mf|his|her} shackled monster. The strange entity, imbued with a sliver of a Star God's power, was beyond the reach of the rulers of the warp. And, as such, they were dangerous and destined to be enslaved.

traits.locale_text: Nomos'un yeni güçlerini tanımak için fazla zamanı olmadı. {name} von Valancius, Karanlık Tanrıların buyruğuyla onu hapsetti ve kontrolü altındaki zincirlenmiş bir yaratığa dönüştürdü. Yıldız Tanrı'nın gücünün bir kısmını bünyesinde barındıran tuhaf varlık, öteboyutun hükümdarlarının ulaşamayacağı bir şeydi ve dolayısıyla fazlasıyla tehlikeliydi ve köleleştirilmesi gerekiyordu.
